text: Love Songs for Robots is the fifth studio album released by Canadian group Patrick Watson. It was released on May 12, 2015."Patrick Watson Details 'Love Songs for Robots' Album". Exclaim!, February 24, 2015. The album was a long- listed nominee for the 2015 Polaris Music Prize."Polaris Music Prize Announces 2015 Long List". Exclaim!, June 16, 2015. ==Track listing== # "Love Songs for Robots" # "Good Morning Mr. Wolf" # "Bollywood" # "Hearts" # "Grace" # "In Circles" # "Turn Into the Noise" # "Alone in This World" # "Know That You Know" # "Places You Will Go" ==References== Category:2015 albums Category:Patrick Watson (musician) albums
title: Love Songs for Robots
